title: Alma Pirata
overview: Benicio De Marco, Cruz Navarro and Iv√°n Ferrer follow the legacy of their deceased parents and they form the "League of the Swords", a secret organization that helps to solve the cases of injustice that occur in society. In the meantime they must seek Alma, something that is still unknown but that they must protect, because if it fell into the wrong hands, humanity would be in danger.
